mapper.insert: insert into p_m_role ( role_id, role_name, category, notes, create_user, last_update_user ) values ( #{roleId}, #{roleName}, #{category}, #{notes}, #{createUser}, #{lastUpdateUser} )
mapper.select: select count(role_id) as data_count from p_m_role where role_id=#{roleId}

select p_m_role.role_id, p_m_role.role_name, p_m_role.category, p_m_role.notes, p_m_role.create_date, p_m_role.create_user, p_m_role.last_update_date, p_m_role.last_update_user from p_m_role where p_m_role.role_id = #{roleId}
select p_m_role.role_id, p_m_role.role_name, p_m_role.category, p_m_role.notes, p_m_role.create_date, p_m_role.create_user, p_m_role.last_update_date, p_m_role.last_update_user from p_m_role

select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.category, r.notes, r.create_date, r.create_user, r.last_update_date, r.last_update_user from p_m_role r where 1=1 and role_id like concat('%',#{roleId},'%') and role_name like concat('%',#{roleName},'%') and category=#{category} and notes=#{notes} and create_date=#{createDate} and create_user=#{createUser}
mapper.delete: delete from p_m_role where exists( select p_m_role_inclusion.role_id from p_m_role_inclusion where p_m_role_inclusion.parent_role_id = #{roleId} and p_m_role_inclusion.role_id = p_m_role.role_id)
mapper.select: select p_m_role.role_id, p_m_role.role_name, p_m_role.category, p_m_role.notes, p_m_role.create_date, p_m_role.create_user, p_m_role.last_update_date, p_m_role.last_update_user from p_m_role,p_m_menu_role where p_m_role.role_id = p_m_menu_role.role_id and p_m_menu_role.menu_id = #{menuId}

select p_m_role.role_id, p_m_role.role_name, p_m_role.category, p_m_role.notes, p_m_role.create_date, p_m_role.create_user, p_m_role.last_update_date, p_m_role.last_update_user from p_m_role,p_m_menu_role,tbl_user where p_m_role.role_id = p_m_menu_role.role_id and p_m_menu_role.menu_id = #{menuId} and tbl_user.user_id = p_m_role.create_user and p_m_role.create_user=#{createUser} and tbl_user.USER_LEVAL in (1,2)

select p_m_role.role_id, p_m_role.role_name, p_m_role.category, p_m_role.notes, p_m_role.create_date, p_m_role.create_user, p_m_role.last_update_date, p_m_role.last_update_user from p_m_role,p_m_action_role where p_m_role.role_id = p_m_action_role.role_id and p_m_action_role.action_id = #{actionId}

select p_m_role.role_id, p_m_role.role_name, p_m_role.category, p_m_role.notes, p_m_role.create_date, p_m_role.create_user, p_m_role.last_update_date, p_m_role.last_update_user from p_m_role,p_m_app_api_role where p_m_role.role_id = p_m_app_api_role.role_id and p_m_app_api_role.app_api_id = #{appApiId}

select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.category, r.notes, r.create_date, r.create_user, r.last_update_date, r.last_update_user from p_m_role r,p_m_user_role ur where r.role_id=ur.role_id and ur.user_id=#{userId}

select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.category, r.notes, r.create_date, r.create_user, u.user_account createUserAccount, r.last_update_date, r.last_update_user from p_m_role r left join tbl_user u ON r.CREATE_USER=u.user_id where r.category!=4 order by r.create_date limit #{pager.offset},#{pager.numPerPage}
select count(1) from p_m_role r where r.category!=4

select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.category, r.notes, r.create_date, r.create_user, u.user_account createUserAccount, r.last_update_date, r.last_update_user from p_m_role r left join tbl_user u ON r.CREATE_USER=u.user_id where r.category=#{userLevel} order by r.create_date limit #{pager.offset},#{pager.numPerPage}
select count(1) from p_m_role r where r.category=#{userLevel}

select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.category, r.notes, r.create_date, r.create_user, u.user_account createUserAccount, r.last_update_date, r.last_update_user from p_m_role r left join tbl_user u ON r.CREATE_USER=u.user_id where 1=1 and r.category=3 and r.create_user in(select user_id from tbl_user_business where busi_company_id=#{busiCompanyId}) order by r.create_date limit #{pager.offset},#{pager.numPerPage}
select count(1) from p_m_role r where 1=1 and r.category=3 and r.create_user in(select user_id from tbl_user_business where busi_company_id=#{busiCompanyId})

select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.category, r.notes, r.create_date, r.create_user, u.user_account createUserAccount, r.last_update_date, r.last_update_user from p_m_role r left join tbl_user u ON r.CREATE_USER=u.user_id where r.create_user=#{userId} order by r.create_date limit #{pager.offset},#{pager.numPerPage}
select count(1) from p_m_role r where r.create_user>=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into p_m_user_role SELECT #{0},role_id,now(),1,now(),1 FROM p_m_role where FIND_IN_SET(ROLE_ID,#{1}) ;
